title: Oddballs
description:
Todd Shaffer, Julie Threlkeld and Regan Wann share stories about a nutty landlord, a bisexual reveal, and a CPR surprise.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (The Haggis Horns, Todd Shaffer, Swing Out Sister, Regan Wann, Cassandra Wilson, Robert Fullum, Kevin Allison, Julie Threlkeld)
